name: Drone Prototype
description:
A small project in which through physics we try to simulate the mechanics of a drone. I've used the new input system to experiment with it.

The development is not finished, the intention is to improve the project by adding features and functions.
At this moment, apart from the basic movement of the drone, it has two cameras. One in third person that follows him and another one that would do the function of the integrated camera, which we will be able to adjust.

It has added a drop-down with the information of the controls to be able to consult it at any time.
